text:
[Verse]
Neon lights so bright
Running through the night
Lost but feeling right
City magic in sight

[Verse 2]
Crowds and busy streets
Rhythm in my feet
Endless beats repeat
Dancing to the heat

[Chorus]
Lost in the city
Feeling so free
Faces unknown
It's where I wanna be

[Verse 3]
Under the stars glow
Fast and feeling slow
Wander to where it goes
In twilight's show

[Verse 4]
Voices call my name
In this urban game
It's never the same
Catch a glimpse of fame

[Chorus]
Lost in the city
Feeling so free
Faces unknown
It's where I wanna be
title: Lost in the City
